name: Barge
description:
Barge is our love letter to Darkest Dungeon and the burgeoning rogue-like/party management genre. Barge is a rogue-like boat management game featuring turn-based combat, hard dilemmas, and the irradiated seas of the future. Manage your crew in order to make enough food and weapons to survive the seas and make it to habitable land. 

- Manage a growing crew across 7 different worksites

- Construct and add new weapons to your barge

- Sail the seas facing random events, merchants, and  boat-on-boat combat

- Make the right choices to maintain both your crew's heath and their opinion of you

- Find out if you have what it takes to bring your crew to habitable land alive
